beer.beer_description:
*4% on cask, 4.4% in bottles*
Flame gold in colour, this igniting ale flares complex fruits across your tongue leaving a dry fruity, thirst suppressing bitter finish.

Hopped with: Sterling, Amarillo, Centennial, Cascade, Chinook

items.badge_description: Fresh from the tap is one of the best ways to enjoy a beer. Just try to use a glass and not drink directly from the tap, as tempting as it may be. That's 50 checkins with the serving style of Draft. Try 5 more for Level 11!

While a pint of traditional English ale will always remain a staple, the craft beer scene in England, much like the rest of the world, has continued to grow at a rapid rate! That's 100 different beers from a brewery from England! Try 5 more for Level 21!

items.badge_description: While spontaneity can be fun, sometimes you want to make sure your adventure will rock. Checkout the menu at an Untappd Verified Venue before visiting and know exactly what’s on tap! That's 120 check-ins at venue that is verified. Try 5 more for Level 25!

items.badge_description: 99 bottles of beer on the wall, 99 bottles of beer. Take one down, pass it around.... That's 405 checkins with the serving style of Bottle. Try 5 more for Level 82!

items.checkin_comment: Christmas dinner slightly delayed so a quick Inferno to pass the time.

user.bio:
Burning up in flames,

Reduced to nothing but ash,

Drifting on the wind

items.badge_description: It takes the perfect amount of light, the right framing and a touch of creative love to get the perfect picture of your brew. Now it’s time to drink it! That’s 220 check-ins with a photo.

Sometimes you need a break from all the hops, fruits, and spices. What better way than with a crisp, smooth Blonde Ale or Golden Ale? Basic but delicious. That's 25 different beers with the style of Blonde Ale or Golden Ale. Try 5 more for Level 6!
Had enough tea and biscuits? Head to the pub for a pint! That's at least 440 beers from the UK. Try 5 more for Level 89.

While a pint of traditional English ale will always remain a staple, the craft beer scene in England, much like the rest of the world, has continued to grow at a rapid rate! That's 415 different beers from a brewery from England! Try 5 more for Level 84!
